unnormalised: I remember being so stressed during my IIT JEE prep back in 2010. Wish these mental health apps were around then! My friend, Priya, uses one now and says it's a lifesaver. Reminds me of that scene in "3 Idiots" where Rancho talks about all is well. I think it can be a great first step before seeing a proper doctor in AIIMS, right?
normalised: I remember being so stressed during my I I T J E E prep back in two thousand and ten. Wish these mental health apps were around then! My friend, Priya, uses one now and says it's a lifesaver. Reminds me of that scene in "Three Idiots" where Rancho talks about all is well. I think it can be a great first step before seeing a proper doctor in A I I M S, right?
